root: ^I found some of your family members. They were happy to hear about you.
^They... they were? Do you... really mean that?
^Yes. They miss you. And they said they would like to meet you.
^I... I... No. I can’t. I can’t go talk to them.
^How about if they would come and talk to you? Would that be easier?
^They are your family. They know you. They won’t do anything that would make you feel bad.
^But... I miss them. I... Maybe. Maybe.
^Thank you. You have been a great help.
^This will let you talk to ghosts all the time, wherever you are.
